Tips for startup drafts that include 21 picks: 

-1.02 goes 3rd round- way too high
-2nd & 3rd round picks are criminally undervalued
-you can get guys to move off late 1sts pretty easily in trades
-focus on 22 picks if you're patient. 1sts/2nds are thrown around stupid cheap.

#flutter tip: To remove the off-putting white splash screen on the startup of your app, utilize the "flutter_native_splash" package. 

This will let you place any image you'd like in place of the white splash screen, improving the UX of your app.

Any tips, ideas, suggestions to scale PR activities for a startup?

TIA

#seo tip for startups:

Pick a phrase that you want to rank for: "software for freelancers"

Search on Google and scroll down to the bottom.

Find the "related searches".

Use those phrases on your site to give Google a green flag that your site is a great place to send people 🔥

Hello to all my new followers 👋

I'd love to hear more about your startups. It helps me craft my future tweets on marketing and startup tips
